meanings.sent1: She looked at him sickliest as he coughed uncontrollably.
meanings.sent2: The flowers wilted sickliest under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed sickliest after eating too much tuna.
meanings.sent4: The old house creaked sickliest in the middle of the night.
meanings.sent5: The baby cried sickliest after getting her vaccination.

meanings.sent1: The sickliest plant in the garden struggled to survive.
meanings.sent2: She had the sickliest complexion of anyone I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The sickliest looking dog turned out to be the friendliest.
meanings.sent4: The sickliest tree in the forest stood out among the lush greenery.
meanings.sent5: His sickliest cough made everyone worry about his health.
